basics.name: Aayush Dalal
basics.label: Researcher • Software Engineer • Data Scientist
basics.summary: Self-disciplined researcher and software professional specializing in Generative AI, LLM optimization, data science, and advanced cloud engineering. Experienced with PyTorch, CUDA, RAG systems, multi-agent orchestration, and full-stack software engineering.

work.name: Gallogly College of Engineering, University of Oklahoma
work.summary: Researching LLM inference optimization on constrained hardware using PyTorch, CUDA, and supercomputing environments.
highlights: Analyzed Meta LLMs, Ollama3, ChatRTX, and transformer architectures
Built neural networks and transformers from scratch in PyTorch
Ran large-scale experiments on OU’s supercomputer
Authored a research paper documenting experimental findings

work.name: IgnAite (FinTech Startup)
work.summary: Performed industry-level data analytics to identify critical problems in the financial sector.
highlights: Led data analysis workflows and mentored colleagues
Used Oracle APEX and Node.js to integrate datasets across teams

work.name: University of Oklahoma Libraries
work.summary: Provided technical support for enterprise-level library systems and hardware.
highlights: Deployed Windows PCs for library staff
Worked with Jamf, KACE, and enterprise software tools

certificates.name: PCPP1 – Certified Professional Python Programmer Level 1

projects.name: Automated Documentation System (Capstone)
projects.summary: Python + Ansible-based automation tool integrating with Confluence API to generate intelligent documentation using system facts.
highlights: Built Ansible plugin and YAML automation pipelines
Led project planning and sprint cycles
Integrated Python with playbooks and tested via unit + integration testing

projects.name: Hexadecimal Arithmetic & Conversion Assembly Program
projects.summary: Developed an assembly-language program for hex input processing, conversion, and arithmetic operations.

projects.name: British Airways Data Science Simulation (Forage)
projects.summary: Performed customer review scraping and predictive modeling to determine buying behavior.

projects.name: BCG Data Science Simulation (Forage)
projects.summary: Customer churn analysis with a random forest model achieving 85% accuracy.

projects.name: Tata Data Visualization Simulation
projects.summary: Created executive-level dashboards and analytics visuals.

projects.name: EA Software Engineering Virtual Experience
projects.summary: Proposed a new EA Sports CFB feature, built C++ class diagrams, and implemented bug fixes with data structure optimization.
